properties.name: Disabled
properties.help: Create the autoscale settings in a disabled state.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the autoscale settings.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Count
properties.help: The numer of instances to use. If used with --min/max-count, the default number of instances to use.

properties.name: MaxCount
properties.help: The maximum number of instances.

properties.name: MinCount
properties.help: The minimum number of instances.

properties.name: Action
properties.help: Add an action to fire when a scaling event occurs.

properties.name: EmailAdministrator
properties.help: Send email to subscription administrator on scaling.

properties.name: EmailCoadministrators
properties.help: Send email to subscription co-administrators on scaling.

properties.name: Resource
properties.help: Name or ID of the target resource.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceNamespace
properties.help: Target resource provider namespace.

properties.name: ResourceParent
properties.help: Target resource parent path, if applicable.

properties.name: ResourceType
properties.help: Target resource type. Can also accept namespace/type format (Ex: 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines)').

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Aggregation
properties.help: Type of aggregation to apply based on --period.

properties.help: The condition which triggers the rule.

properties.name: Metric
properties.help: Name of the metric to base the rule on.

properties.name: Operator
properties.help: How to compare the metric against the threshold.

properties.name: Period
properties.help: Time span over which to apply --aggregation, in nDnHnMnS shorthand or full ISO8601 format.

properties.name: Threshold
properties.help: Numeric threshold at which to trigger the alert.

properties.name: MaxEvents
properties.help: Maximum number of records to return.

properties.name: Select
properties.help: Space-separated list of properties to return.

properties.help: Caller to query for, such as an e-mail address or service principal ID.

properties.name: CorrelationId
properties.help: Correlation ID to query.

properties.name: Filters
properties.help: OData filters. Will ignore other filter arguments.

properties.help: Resource provider namespace.

properties.name: ResourceId
properties.help: ARM ID of a resource.

properties.name: Status
properties.help: Status to query for (ex: Failed).

properties.name: EndTime
properties.help: End time of the query. Defaults to the current time. Format: date (yyyy-mm-dd) time (hh:mm:ss.xxxxx) timezone (+/-hh:mm).

properties.name: Offset
properties.help: Time offset of the query range, in ##d##h format.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.help: Start time of the query. Format: date (yyyy-mm-dd) time (hh:mm:ss.xxxxx) timezone (+/-hh:mm).

properties.name: Categories
properties.help: Space-separated categories of the logs. These categories are created as is convenient to the user. Some values are Write, Delete, and/or Action.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Locations
properties.help: Space-separated list of regions for which Activity Log events should be stored.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the log profile.

properties.name: ServiceBusRuleId
properties.help: The service bus rule ID of the service bus namespace in which you would like to have Event Hubs created for streaming the Activity Log. The rule ID is of the format '{service bus resource ID}/authorizationrules/{key name}'.

properties.name: StorageAccountId
properties.help: The resource id of the storage account to which you would like to send the Activity Log.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Days
properties.help: The number of days for the retention in days. A value of 0 will retain the events indefinitely.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.help: Whether the retention policy is enabled.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Aggregation
properties.help: The list of aggregation types (space-separated) to retrieve.

properties.name: Dimension
properties.help: The list of dimensions (space-separated) the metrics are queried into.

properties.name: Filter
properties.help: A string used to reduce the set of metric data returned. eg. "BlobType eq '*'".

properties.name: Metadata
properties.help: Returns the metadata values instead of metric data.

properties.name: Metrics
properties.help: Space-separated list of metric names to retrieve.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.help: Namespace to query metric definitions for.

properties.name: Orderby
properties.help: Aggregation to use for sorting results and the direction of the sort. Only one order can be specificed. Examples: sum asc.

properties.name: Top
properties.help: Max number of records to retrieve. Valid only if --filter used.

properties.name: Resource
properties.help: Name or ID of the target resource.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.help: Target resource provider namespace.

properties.help: Target resource parent path, if applicable.

properties.help: Target resource type. Can also accept namespace/type format (Ex: 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines)').

properties.name: EndTime
properties.help: End time of the query. Defaults to the current time. Format: date (yyyy-mm-dd) time (hh:mm:ss.xxxxx) timezone (+/-hh:mm).

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: The interval over which to aggregate metrics, in ##h##m format.

properties.name: Offset
properties.help: Time offset of the query range, in ##d##h format.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.help: Start time of the query. Format: date (yyyy-mm-dd) time (hh:mm:ss.xxxxx) timezone (+/-hh:mm).
